full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I BSKANG BA MCHOD BSTOD KYI RIM PA STOBS LDAN YID 'GUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA THUGS DAM BSKANG BA'I RIM PA STOBS LDAN YID 'GUL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI KUN RTOG GI RIM MOR BSTAN BSRUNG NYID KYIS BSKUL MA JI LTAR MDZAD PA BZHIN, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG PO'I MING GZHAN BREL GNON DBANG DRAG RTZAL CES BYA BAS AE REG PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYI SA'I CHA LAS NOR 'DZIN GYI THIG LER GYUR BA 'OD GSAL LHA RIGS 'DZIN PA'I RGYAL KHAB CHEN POR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RIG 'DZIN PA'I TSE RING NOR BU'O,, ,,)
